titles.title: To require a 50 percent reduction in the number of limousines in the Federal fleet.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 3/27/2014--Introduced. Prohibits the number of limousines in the federal fleet for FY2015 and each fiscal year thereafter from exceeding 50% of the number of such limousines in the fleet as of the last day of FY2014. Excepts any limousine determined to be essential for reasons of national security.
